not possible, then the Checklist user should confirm that the baby is bottle-feeding adequately. 
Signs of feeding well in the baby are active feeding every 1-3 hours with frequent urination 
or stooling.11,18,22,24 If the baby is not feeding well, then help should be given to the mother 
and the baby to establish good feeding and discharge should be delayed.
